data.actual_result: The category stays in the list, and when tapped, the client crashes.
data.expected_result: The client should not crash, and the category should be removed from the category list.
data.short_description: Trying to move a channel into a non-existent category crashes the client.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a testing category and a voice or text channel. - Go to the voice/text channel's settings, then go to the category section. - Delete the category on another device, then try to tap the category on the iOS Device to move the channel to that category.
